verses.verse: Elihu <S%H453><s%> also <S%H3254>proceeded<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Suffer <S%H3803><s%> me a <S%H2191>little<s%>, and I will <S%H2331>show<s%> <S%H4405>thee<s%>; For I have yet somewhat to say on <S%H433>God<s%>'s behalf.
I will <S%H5375>fetch<s%> my <S%H1843>knowledge<s%> from <S%H7350>afar<s%>, And will <S%H5414>ascribe<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> to my <S%H6466>Maker<s%>.
For <S%H551>truly<s%> my <S%H4405>words<s%> are not <S%H8267>false<s%>: One that is <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in knowledge is with <S%H1844>thee<s%>.
Behold <S%H410><s%>, God is <S%H3524>mighty<s%>, and <S%H3988>despiseth<s%> not <S%H3524>any<s%>: He is mighty in <S%H3581>strength<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding<s%>.
He preserveth not the <S%H2421>life<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, But <S%H5414>giveth<s%> to the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> their <S%H4941>right<s%>.

He <S%H1639>withdraweth<s%> not his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: But with <S%H4428>kings<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> He <S%H3427>setteth<s%> them for <S%H5331>ever<s%>, and they are <S%H1361>exalted<s%>.
And if they be <S%H631>bound<s%> in <S%H2131>fetters<s%>, And be <S%H3920>taken<s%> in the <S%H2256>cords<s%> of <S%H6040>afflictions<s%>;
Then he <S%H5046>showeth<s%> them their <S%H6467>work<s%>, And their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>, that they have behaved themselves <S%H1396>proudly<s%>.
He <S%H1540>openeth<s%> also their <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H4148>instruction<s%>, And <S%H559>commandeth<s%> that they <S%H7725>return<s%> from <S%H205>iniquity<s%>.
If they <S%H8085>hearken<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3615>him<s%>, They shall spend their <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H2896>prosperity<s%>, And their <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H5273>pleasures<s%>.
But if they <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H5674>not<s%>, they shall perish by the <S%H7973>sword<s%>, And they shall <S%H1478>die<s%> without <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.
But they that are <S%H2611>godless<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> lay <S%H7760>up<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>: They <S%H7768>cry<s%> not for help when he bindeth <S%H631>them<s%>.
They <S%H5315><s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H5290>youth<s%>, And their <S%H2416>life<s%> perisheth among the <S%H6945>unclean<s%>.
He <S%H2502>delivereth<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> by their <S%H6040>affliction<s%>, And <S%H1540>openeth<s%> their <S%H241>ear<s%> in <S%H3906>oppression<s%>.

Yea <S%H5496><s%>, he would have allured thee out of <S%H6310>distress<s%> Into a broad <S%H7338>place<s%>, <S%H8478>where<s%> there is no <S%H4164>straitness<s%>; And that which is <S%H5183>set<s%> on thy <S%H7979>table<s%> would be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1880>fatness<s%>.
But thou art <S%H4390>full<s%> of the <S%H1779>judgment<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>: <S%H1779>Judgment<s%> and <S%H1779>justice<s%> take hold on <S%H8551>thee<s%>.
For let not <S%H2534>wrath<s%> stir thee up <S%H5496>against<s%> <S%H5607>chastisements<s%>; Neither let the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of the <S%H3724>ransom<s%> turn thee <S%H5186>aside<s%>.
Will thy <S%H7769>cry<s%> <S%H6186>avail<s%>, that thou be not in <S%H1222>distress<s%>, Or all the <S%H3981>forces<s%> of thy <S%H3581>strength<s%>?
Desire <S%H7602><s%> not the <S%H3915>night<s%>, When <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are cut off in their <S%H5927>place<s%>.
Take <S%H8104>heed<s%>, <S%H6437>regard<s%> not <S%H205>iniquity<s%>: For this hast thou <S%H977>chosen<s%> rather than <S%H6040>affliction<s%>.
Behold <S%H410><s%>, God doeth <S%H7682>loftily<s%> in his <S%H3581>power<s%>: Who is a teacher like unto <S%H3384>him<s%>?
Who hath <S%H6485>enjoined<s%> him his <S%H1870>way<s%>? Or who can <S%H559>say<s%>, Thou hast <S%H6466>wrought<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%>?
Remember <S%H2142><s%> that thou <S%H7679>magnify<s%> his <S%H6467>work<s%>, Whereof <S%H582>men<s%> have <S%H7891>sung<s%>.
All <S%H120>men<s%> have <S%H2372>looked<s%> <S%H582>thereon<s%>; Man <S%H5027>beholdeth<s%> it afar <S%H7350>off<s%>.
Behold <S%H410><s%>, God is <S%H7689>great<s%>, and we <S%H3045>know<s%> him <S%H4557>not<s%>; The number of his <S%H8141>years<s%> is <S%H2714>unsearchable<s%>.
For he draweth <S%H1639>up<s%> the <S%H5198>drops<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>, Which <S%H2212>distil<s%> in <S%H4306>rain<s%> from his <S%H108>vapor<s%>,
Which the <S%H7834>skies<s%> pour <S%H7491>down<s%> And <S%H5140>drop<s%> upon <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7227>abundantly<s%>.
Yea <S%H995><s%>, can any understand the <S%H4666>spreadings<s%> of the <S%H5645>clouds<s%>, The <S%H8663>thunderings<s%> of his <S%H5521>pavilion<s%>?
Behold <S%H6566><s%>, he spreadeth his <S%H216>light<s%> around <S%H3680>him<s%>; And he covereth the <S%H8328>bottom<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.
For by these he <S%H1777>judgeth<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>; He <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H400>food<s%> in <S%H4342>abundance<s%>.
He <S%H3680>covereth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> with the <S%H216>lightning<s%>, And giveth it a <S%H6680>charge<s%> that it strike the <S%H6293>mark<s%>.
The <S%H7452>noise<s%> thereof <S%H5046>telleth<s%> concerning <S%H4735>him<s%>, The cattle also concerning the storm that cometh <S%H5927>up<s%>.
